column4: Hello.  My LCD monitor's native rez is 1440x900 @ 60hz.  When I was using Windows, this is how it was set up.  Now in Ubuntu, my refresh rate is at 50hz.  Is this too low?  Could I damage my monitor?  There is no option to select 60hz.
my 1600x1200 is set way lower on xubuntu also, seems to be driver errors, but it's not uncommon
I'm using a 320gb right now, it works fine
